category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_SchedulingEngineOptions
preference.preference_description: Manages the deactivation of scheduling and execution validations. Valid Values: * 0: Both scheduling and execution validations are disabled. This is the default value. * 1: Only the scheduling validation is disabled. The default value is 1. If the preference does not have any value, both scheduling and execution validations are enabled. System throws an error if the preference value is set to anything other than 0 or 1.
